## 1. Summary
This analysis explores smart device usage data to identify trends that can inform Bellabeat's marketing strategy.

## 2. Setting Up the Environment
```{r setup}
# Loading packages
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)


# Load the daily activity dataset
daily_activity <- read_csv("dailyActivity_merged.csv")

# Preview the data
head(daily_activity)

# Remove rows where TotalSteps is 0
daily_activity_clean <- daily_activity %>%
  filter(TotalSteps > 0)

# Check the new number of rows
nrow(daily_activity_clean)

ggplot(data=daily_activity_clean, aes(x=TotalSteps, y=Calories)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE) +
  labs(title="Correlation between Daily Steps and Calories",
       x="Total Steps",
       y="Calories Burned")
```
